post.body: Totally! In my dream everyone thought I was trying to kill myself, but it was just very peaceful there underwater :-)
I'll definitely go look for some - thanks for the tip! To me it just doesn't look quite right with those rainbow colors...
where in FL? I live in the Tampa Bay area.. beautiful day today!!!
I usually right-click, Save As the image from Etsy, save it to my PC, then upload it to my blog... is that what you're doing?
So true! Great quote
Nope :(
btw I totally have my eye on your little soap sampler... what a great idea!
It's my fault for preferring those nice heavy glass mixing bowls...
Just voted on your blog :).
I managed to get my hands on one - thanks for looking anyway! :-)
I'm hoping that's a hypothetical question... :)
well then here's a toast to you as well! *Raises glass of wine for modbird* May you get on that path very soon. :)
Yep - that's the main reason we bought the Wii - better family-type games. Get Mario Kart for Wii, so much fun!
Looks like we can count on our men to 100% support our desire for gaming consoles! :)
LOL :). When we saw the Fit in the store I said "I'd kinda like to get that", and my hubby grabbed it B4 I said another word!
I tried the ski slalom and the Wii Fit pad is pretty sensitive - I was actually surprised by its accuracy! Yoga tomorrow :-)
Once I get used to the running section I think I might really enjoy that part of it, and I haven't even checked the yoga yet
I certainly will! The Wii Fit has a whole section on improving balance, which I'm horrible at - and laughing doesn't help!
I decided to build my own light box for taking pictures. I googled and found some how-to's. Any advice out there?
does anyone else remember when tinsel was actually silver, and not this laser-etched multicolored stuff?
my 2yo son is redecorating the christmas tree. Apparently he doesn't like that they're not grouped together into similar colors/shapes
I added a keyring pen to my mini notepad and went grocery shopping, hands free! Here's one in my Etsy shop: http://tinyurl.com/5qvo8h
is anyone else still christmas shopping? I can't believe I haven't found anything for my dad yet. He's SO hard to shop for argh
morning all
hmm hang on... he just ran by here with his hammer... I think I better check to see what he's up to in there
now he's busy taking the ornaments off the tree and putting them back into their boxes
last night we decorated the christmas tree... my 2yo son spent the whole time organizing the ornaments into their various boxes LOL
morning all
I can't believe I hurt my hand doing the dishes last night.. now this morning my whole arm hurts. sigh
morning all!
We just finished watching SciFi's "The Lost Room" on DVD. Wow, kind of awesome. Why didn't they continue that with a series?
I wetvacced our carpet today.. what an unbelievable difference it made! I won't even tell you what color the water was at the end of it
anyone have a savings account with ING direct? I'm looking for a referral code so I can get the $25 bonus for opening a new account there...
Last night my 2yo son played the balance games for Wii Fit, with me steering him. After a while I couldn't play I was laughing too hard!
Having immense fun watching my hubby play Wii Fit... he's so serious about it! He's currently doing the ski jump
oops sorry for the double post :/
New mini notepad posted on Etsy last night, "Zig": http://tinyurl.com/7wbog6
I just found out I'm in another treasury! Yay! Go see: http://tinyurl.com/88tsl2
New mini notepad just posted on Etsy! Called "Zig": http://tinyurl.com/7wbog6
for the first time in my life I feel like I'm actually heading in the right direction with my life... how's that for a profound twitter? LOL
